title: A Stone for Amer
description: Will Lindstrom was only sixteen when he traveled with his father from their farm in southern Minnesota to the "godforsaken" wilds of eastern Montana in 1919 to claim the body of his Uncle Amer. All these years later, Will finally reveals to his daughter Callie the truths he learned about his beloved uncle and the prejudice that killed him and wounded his family.
author: Connie Claire Szarke
